credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Recto: Sketches of Figures at Ship's Railings
description:
Recto: Vertical sketch of a portion of a ship showing an open deck with two seamen standing at a rail and a companionway leading to a lower deck.  Two sketches of a ship's bell, and rope with block and tackle are also visible.

Verso: Two heads.
name: Drawing
